name: Zombie Cruise - Love, boat, zombies!
blurb: A story-oriented romantic action adventure set on a luxurious singles' cruise that gets hit by a zombie infection.

rewards.reward: You'll get, not only our deepest gratitude, but also a warm fuzzy feeling of supporting something great. It's the same fuzzy feeling one of our team members now can get at a local pub thanks to your support.
You'll get the Zombie Cruise ringtone (you hear it in the beginning of the video) plus a nice ZC wallpaper for your iPad - with a true romantic zombie feeling.
You'll get a limited-edition PC version of the game. And if we get to make Episodes 2 & 3, you'll get those as well! \r\n\r\nPlus of course you'll get all the goodies from the lower tiers.
With 20 dollars you'll get your name on the game's thank you list. You'll also get a deluxe package of wallpapers, and all the goodies from the lower tiers.
With 30 dollars, we'll send you a personalized thank you card. A great way to get a warm greeting from a cold country! \r\n\r\nAnd, of course, all the goodies from the lower tiers.
You'll get The Zombie Cruise soundtrack as a digital download. That's your Halloween party playlist right there! \r\n\r\nIncludes all the goodies from the lower tiers.

You can get our eternal gratitude with just 60 dollars. Instead of getting into the thank you list, we'll add your name as one of the contributors in the game credits. \r\n\r\nAdditionally, you get all the goodies from the lower tiers.

You'll get an invitation to test the game via Testflight. Get the game on your iPad before release, and start testing! You'll get credited as a game tester.  (Thanks to Apple we have to limit a lot how many people can get this tier.)\r\n\r\nOf course all the lower tier rewards are included as well.

You'll get a Zombie Cruise t-shirt.
Either we vomit on a regular one to make it a Zombie Cruise t-shirt, or you'll get one with game art on it. You choose! 

Also, you get all the goodies from the unlimited lower tiers.

A digital package of game concept art + compilation of our best zombie growls to go with it. Use the growls to scare your little sister, to freak out your neighbours or to make your visit to the cemetery a bit more exciting. Or whatever catches your fancy. \r\n\r\nIncludes all the prizes from the unlimited lower tiers.

With this tier you get to show your love and appreciation to someone you know with a surprise call. We'll make a zombie Skype call to a phone number of your choice with a message of your choosing. Want the zombies to ask someone to marry them? Or pardon in your behalf for being late? You'll have 5 pre-recorded calls to choose from and if you add 20 dollars extra, we'll arrange an extra recording session so we can customise the call with your specifications. "Grrrawwwllll.. isss this Matt? Sorrrrry I couldn't make it to your wedding." is definitely better than just a generic call without names.

Please don't choose a recipient without a sense of humour. We'll all walk away more thankful after that. ;)

Also includes all the unlimited lower tier rewards.

Become a part of the game's lore. With just 200 dollars you get to appear in the in-game scrap book and become a part of the background story of M/S Birds of Paradise.\r\nIncludes all the goodies from the lower unlimited tiers.

Your drink will be added to the game's scrap book. You name the drink and let us know what it consists of and it all gets into the game. This is your chance to show your bartending skills. \r\nAll the goodies from the unlimited lower tiers are of course included.

A virtual date with Nikki Titbanger. You get to ask what you want about her, Zombie Cruise, how the development is going or what is important to her in life. You know, whatever you want to know! And through webcam you get to see her make all of her animations as she replies to you. The unlimited lower tier rewards are included as well. PLEASE NOTE: We mean a virtual date with the game character and NOT the actor in the video. The actor is engaged already! :(

With just 500 dollars you can add a picture of your choice to a zombie's t-shirt in-game. Again, this is a good way to immortalise yourself. Who knows why the zombies originally came to the cruise, so your picture can be anything. "I love you Sven" will be the Swedish choice, but promoting your band or company or letting people know you love your mom are good choices as well. We will make sure the t-shirt looks cool, no matter what you choose.\r\nIncludes all the goodies from the unlimited lower tiers.

You'll get the 3D models for our main characters. Make your own spoof videos with them, or use them in your own game. We give you free reign! Remember, even Nikki's tits have been boned so creating your own animations is very easy. Plus of course all the goodies from the unlimited lower tiers.
We'll model your face into the game as a zombie or one the NPCs, depending on how you look and how you fit into the game lore. Includes all the goodies from the unlimited lower tiers.

Join us at the Zombie Cruise launch party and be treated as a VIP for the duration of your visit. The launch party will be held in cooperation with Zombie Walk Oulu so the party will have tons of zombies roaming the premises. Never has there been a better time to visit Finland! With the 2500 dollars you'll not only have free drinks and dinner, but you also get to spend time with the development team in a sauna! Spending time naked with game developers, programmers and artists - in a hot, steamy room! Who wouldn't want that? Please note that the reward does not include travelling costs, so as long as you get yourself to Oulu, we'll handle the rest. Plus you get all the goodies from the unlimited lower tiers.
